actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the uniform allowances available to Federal firefighters.

summary.text: Increases the uniform allowance payable to Federal firefighters. Authorizes the Civil Service Commission to prescribe regulations for the administration of provisions relating to Federal employee uniform allowances.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the uniform allowances available to Federal firefighters.
